title: synergysize
author: synergysize
content: If you have a wallet that was originally funded by Quadriga exchange, I will give you free money to make a transaction.  It's that simple.  Depending on how big of a purchase you want to make, I'll pay you up to .2ETH just to buy a tax-free coin and hold it for a couple of days.  I'll cover gas, too.Interested?  Message me here, on Discord (singDevil#2273) or on Telegram at @Scrypticism (https://t.me/Scrypticism)
